Package org.garret.perst

Class Assert

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.garret.perst.Assert

  • public class Assert
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for checking program invariants. Analog of C assert() macro. The Java compiler doesn't provide information about compiled file and line number, so the place of assertion failure can be located only by analyzing the stack trace of the thrown AssertionFailed exception.
    See Also:
    AssertionFailed

      Check specified condition and raise AssertionFailed exception if it is not true.

        cond - result of checked condition
